Pramodh Vedula

Gamer/Programmer

About
  • Hi all, to whoever reading this, hope you're having a nice day. I am Pramodh, an amateur programmer but who is willing to work hard to become a professional at my field.

  • Ever since I was a child, I had a significant exposure to computers and I was fascinated about computers and it's day to day technological advancements which piqued my interests in computers even more.

  • I always have questioned how things work in the world of computers, for example: if in a game, how do non playable characters move? How does a car take damage when colliding with objects in game. I searched for its answer and the answer to that was simple. Programming . Each and every thing on the world of computers, smartphones, self-driving cars, Smart-TVs is programmed in a Programming Language.

  • The Programming Languages which caught my curiosity were Python and C++. Python because of it's simplicity and readability and C++ because of it's sheer power.

  • However, a few years ago I didn't possess any knowledge about Programming. But now I do, even though I'm amateur at it and I know I only scratched the tip of the iceberg , I'm excited to know more about it. I keep moving forward, with more drive, with more enthusiasm, and with more vigor.

  • That's all about me, we'll talk more about it, some other day, some other time üòÅüòÅ
